ovdesc.p: The SEAT.ERROR.REPORT is an LIVE template, which holds the records for the scripts that failed during the upload, and also gives the details like SCRIPT.ID, TRANSACTION ID, UPLOAD.STATUS.This file holds all the scripts which has been failed during the upload, and the scripts belongs to the same versions are grouped in one record. The ID of this file will be the version name.

desc.p: Its an multivalue field and it can hold any alphanumeric characters.Based on the field 'UPLOAD.STATUS' in the SEAT.RESULTS file, this field will be updated. If the 'UPLOAD.STATUS is set as 'PROCESSED' then this field will have the values as the combination of the SCRIPT.ID and the Transaction ID. And if the 'UPLOAD.STATUS' is not euqal to 'PROCESSED', this field will hold the value in the format of 'SCRIPT.ID*TXN.ID*ERROR'.
This is an unique ID to identify the record created under this file.This field can have any alphanumeric characters. The SEAT.ERROR.REPORT record ID will be the combination of APPLICATION*VERSION.
